bug.author: umgupta
bug.summary: Problem with nn.Module object in config
bug.description:
wandb --version && python --version && uname wandb, version 0.8.5 Python 3.7.3 Linux <denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
I am trying to sync my run to the wandb dashboard. <denchmark-h:h3>What I Did</denchmark-h>
wandb sync <folder path> <denchmark-code>yaml.constructor.ConstructorError: while constructing a Python object module 'torch.nn.modules.container' is not imported in "output/wandb/dryrun-20190811_013519-vymem890/config.yaml", line 32, column 14
</denchmark-code>
Potential Issue: In my config I have nn.Module objects which is having trouble syncing to the cloud.

This should be fixed in 0.8.8, can you see if it still happens for you after running pip install wandb --upgrade
